command.text:
## Welcome to the Alquist Insight bot!
- After opening the app, you can click the 'hamburger' icon on the top left and choose the files that will be used for the search.
- After you type a question, the bot will generate an answer for you, while at the same time showing the PDF files it used on the right side of the screen.
- Under the answer you can find buttons with numbers, referencing the pages the bot used for generating the answer.
- Use the PDF view to ensure the generated answer is correct. **REMEMBER - The bot can make mistakes, always check the answer against the source!**
- You can give feedback by clicking thumbs up/down buttons below the answer.
